title: Tinahely Pet Lodge
subheading: pet hotel website for a small business
description: i built this website for a local pet hotel using wordpress and elementor. it is still running today and has been a great success for the business. i also performed some seo and analytics work on this site.

title: Wick
description: created as part of my college final year project, Wick is a social media management app that allows users to backup their Instagram posts, view analytics, and get content suggestions and advice. it is available on both iOS and Android, and a webapp version is available as part of the promotional website.

title: Spat
description: i built this in unity with the help of a framework called CardHouse. all the pixel art is custom made by me in aseprite. i'm super duper proud of all the work that went into this.

title: nephin.me
description: this very site you're on right now! built with react and tailwindcss, deployed from a github repo, and hosted on netlify.

title: Sitka NG
subheading: music player/manager in an Electron app using Angular
description: a project i was working on with some good friends. we wanted to make a music player that wasn't ugly or bloated. it was being built in parallel with react, and i was reimplementing it in angular. hopefully it will be finished one day!

title: MongoDB Book Manager
subheading: simple CRUD app for managing books via a local API
description: this is a simple full-stack app i built to learn more about mongodb and express. it allows you to add, edit, and delete books from a local database. it can also fetch metadata like book covers from the openlibrary api.

title: Jasmine Jewellery
subheading: site for small business of a friend
description: this is an e-commerce site built as part of a college group project for a friend's jewellery business. it was built with plain html, css, and js. it's hosted on github pages.

title: ATU First Year Website
subheading: guide to being in first year at my college.
description: built with completely vanilla html, css, and js. it's a simple site that taught me some fundamentals of responsive and accessible web design.
